How does one know how to pick a certain sweep mode?=A0 Is that just a range=
 of stations the chip sweeps through?=A0 If so, how does one incorporate an=
y certain sweep?




________________________________
From: purplespacefrie=
nd <purplealiengirl@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, Ju=
ne 28, 2009 1:21:20 AM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Simple FM receiver





There=
's alot of steps invloved, like first you need a tuner--a voltage tunable r=
adio. Then you have to decide what sweep modes you wants, Then whether or n=
ot you'll use an echo chamber, or need line outputs to record from. Then, w=
hat kind of board it'll be on, and last build a cabinet. 

Frank

--- In EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups .com, Elaine Coates <cozykat2003@ ...> wrote:
>
> Frank, =
Would you please send me the circuitry schematic for building your box?=A0 =
My son said he would build one for me but since I am totally clueless as to=
 what he needs to accomplish this I need your input.=A0 I have seen the ide=
as and info bantered about in this discussion group but I don't know what t=
o send my son=A0because you are always tweaking the design and sending new =
information to the group.=A0 If you would send me exactly what me needs and=
 the schematic I would be so grateful.=A0 -Elaine
